thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 25 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Novume - Corrected Error In Accounting Treatment Related To Accretion To Redemption On Series A Preferred Stock

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Novume - Corrected Error In Accounting Treatment Related To Accretion To Redemption On Series A Preferred Stock
text:
Jan 25 (Reuters) - Novume Solutions Inc:
* NOVUME SOLUTIONS - IDENTIFIED, CORRECTED ERROR IN ACCOUNTING TREATMENT RELATED TO ACCRETION TO REDEMPTION VALUE ON SERIES A PREFERRED STOCK AS OF SEPT 30, 2017
* NOVUME SOLUTIONS - DETERMINED THAT ACCRETION WAS MATERIAL TO EPS CALCULATIONS FOR ALL QUARTERS REPORTED IN FISCAL YEAR 2017 THROUGH SEPTEMBER 30, 2017 Source text: ( bit.ly/2DDpTm6 ) Further company coverage:
